name: Tatsugiri ex
author: 5ban Graphics
tera_effect: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks (both yours and your opponent’s).

attacks.name: Surprise Pump
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by any effects on your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Cinnabar Lure
attacks.effect: Look at the top 10 cards of your deck. You may put any number of Pokémon you find there onto your Bench. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

rule_box: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
